
### This is for checking if the RBAC is working correctly

### This is for parsing the cognito auth token. 
TOKEN='eyJraWQiOiJ5SjFnUEVuck9Cd3cwdktGZytRMFRISmlaM2ZYK0xvYmMwQWFSY0g4bUFJPSIsImFsZyI6IlJTMjU2In0..Xc4cMI5egddU4eZFVYVK6ohPTqXFuTQdDUVDQWf2WD_M2gz_nrso6h4LNbCPW4GW7ciWg5ZGWn5I1WEIdggOyyPG6_hTaQxdA_ACMMoB2P8P7isA4xCYUw8h5454iPn-ORPtMSdb-IumXXsAA9fS2ecgN-y9iXq-xl1aa5SRqj1VfLuBe2EZrYma27pI0RQ-59TAGKYHaB7eMuOLEHXd2cgtgTAEgJTJCwfe_ZH-Y60wsl8AVkpJaeF1Las5Fd6QIKJCpT-J3pkaRT_CjhIDU6xtsBcrq7Z3Yd_Li4xi-IqLYzEE3mYDhX_2rbJt44XfNw5pAZqI5j3rrhBxDtiXHA'

echo "$TOKEN" | jq -R 'split(".") | .[1] | @base64d | fromjson'

#### This is the results:
echo "$TOKEN" | jq -R 'split(".") | .[1] | @base64d | fromjson'
